column5: Does anyone drive by that lake on a regular basis? Just curious if the water level is as low now as it was last fall when some dummies decided to damage the artificial dam.  As dangerous as it normally is, I don't feel like taking out my lower unit.
It was way down this summer. Visited the lake 3 times . Sad state it is in.
not sure the status of the lake levels now. Buddy took out his lower unit on a 21 ft Triton this summer. Not good. can be a very dangerous lake
It can be a "mine field" of rock when the water level is slightly down.  I know from experience.  $$$$$$
Most of the kawartha levels are down at this time of the year. I was on that lake once and it scared the heck out of me.
Most of the kawartha levels are down at this time of the year. I was on that lake once and it scared the heck out of me.   I have a small moving toon. LOL

We have a cottage on the lake. It's been a wreck ever since the dam was taken out. Fall the water levels are dangerous. Low water levels killed pretty much all the walleye. It's been a real mess for a while now. Makes me sad.
Thanks for the replies.  I may take a chance next week.
